translated: The four kinds of teeth are on the jaw. It covers the teeth and conceals them, thus it is the palate . The upper part of the head is the skull . The neck is the place where the head is fixed . The cheeks are the two fleshy parts on either side of the mouth . The eyes are the two fleshy organs for seeing . The ears are the two fleshy organs for hearing . The forehead is the place above the eyes . The head-hairs are the hairs on the head . The body-hairs are the hairs on the body . The nails are the nails on the fingers and toes . The skin is what covers the body .
